comment:
Seeing how diabolical she is my theory is that the reason she was saving the so-called evidential photos Etc, creating time lines was because she KNEW that eventually it was going to end badly the way her other relationship ended with abuse allegations . She knew she would look suspect & because Johnny was so beloved & there had not been any previous allegations of him being abusive she HAD to set him up to save herself should it come out. She knew plenty of people have witnessed her abusive behavior. And she knew it would have eventually  come out because it's Hollywood!! I mean, why would it not? Some stylist or personal assistant or hotel employee, etc would eventually talk & she knew it!. Imo she wanted to have leverage in case it came out that she was once again accused of being abusive. 
It would make the previous rumors seem more likely & she knew that in the small world of Hollywood those unpopular type of rumors could ruin a career.
She knew the hollywood would had to choose someone to throw under the bus....
Would it be the Beloved iconic Johnny Depp or some little-known cookie cutter blonde Amber nobody?.. 
She knew that the deck was stacked against her so she had to ruin his reputation in order to make her deniability seem believable.
They say when the common denominator is always you? there has to be something to it...

she was willing to throw Johnny under the bus.
How diabolical is that?
she seems to be expecting him to throw himself on his sward for her.
 She is giving me the impression that although she knows she's guilty of initiating physically abusive altercations, she wants Johnny to sacrifice himself to save her mediocre career. she doesn't want to be a big girl and take account for her actions. 
She feels like someone else should be paying for what she's done wrong...
She clearly needs help and won't get it but shes willing to abuse Johnny's love for her.hoping that he will just take this hit for her because all she keeps talking about is HER reputation....HER image...
Narcissists tend to do that.
 It's sad and it's not right. For her to use  domestic abuse to her advantage when she knows that she is an equally guilty participant in domestic violence is shameful.
It's sad that someone could do that to a partner in order to save themselves... I'm glad he realizes that his version of her was an illusion..a lie... that was never who she was that all.
He got Hoodwinked into being in a relationship with a broken person who clearly needs help but instead of getting that help she would rather destroy him.

comment:
Reminds me of my ex-girlfriend/ex-abuser. The end, when he said she didn't exist...? That's how I feel about my ex. The lies she told to me, about me. My girlfriend did not exist. The girl I loved and dated, her physical body existed, but the mind she tried to create, it went away very quickly. It's very painful to realize something as cruel as a person who created a false reality for you to believe, disappears and you're left with a covert narcissist who brings about false narratives simply to try her best to get you into trouble. I believe her only thought was to ruin my reputation, and to use my empathy to gain my assets. Once I wouldn't conform to her propaganda any longer, wouldn't put up with the drama, she sent the police with fabrications regarding our intimacy, and took me to court to hurt me.

comment:
Amber's right! I don't mean morally right. I mean right in that the world wouldn't believe Johnny Depp being abused rather than an abuser. 
And if Johnny Depp was just an average "Joe" who didn't have personal security, cameras and audio recordings, he'd be thrown under the bus. It happens to men all the time. Women simply hold more power than men in society no matter what the media and the talking heads claim. People are all too quick to believe a woman when she is accusing her husband or boyfriend, and very unconcerned about the reverse. When a husband and wife split up, women have a very powerful option at their disposal: Lies + the legal system = money, unfair custody arrangements and a guy getting screwed over. 
Does anyone believe that similar lies told by the husband will win him anything? The standard of proof for the man in this relationship is very high, while the standard of proof for the woman can often amount to nothing more than her word. When it comes to accusations of abuse in our courts, justice is not blind.
I was accused of domestic violence in my first marriage. On the night in question, the extent of my "abuse" amounted to nothing more than pushing her away from me while she was kicking and slapping me. I had scratches and a torn shirt. I came back home an hour later, hoping she had calmed down or left to see her boyfriend, only to find cops there ready to arrest me. Her evidence amounted to only her false testimony... yet I was cuffed, torn shirt and scratches completely visible. Later she admitted (in private) that this was all in an effort to force me out of the house, a home that was mine before she even moved in! I had little money to mount my own defense in the criminal case. On the first court appearance, I asked for a continuance, since I had no lawyer and the prosecutor was looking to throw the book at me. Standing there before the judge, he said the following, "I will grant your request, but warn you that if you strike your wife again, you will be arrested and bail will not be granted."
Let that sink in! He hadn't even heard the case yet. And there he was, already assuming my guilt and handing her a very powerful weapon to use against me! While leaving the court room, our eyes locked and she had a devilish smirk on her face. I went to stay at a friends house. It was so wrong.

comment: And this is what toxic Femininity looks like.... hah, toxic masculinity my ass. This is what a typical heartless egotistical "empowered" woman who doesn't give a damn about her man does. Ive been there before, not with marriage, but ive seen what they can do in even just regular ltr's, ive also seen others go through the wringer on both marriage and standard ltr's, I just left an unstable abusive woman my self after a few years of trying everything, the stress made me sick.... I can only imagine how john is doing, In this case, it's especially messed up because now even in this situation, with a dude who is well known, talented, made movies, won awards, basically someone whos made it in life and potentially has everything to loose, this illustrates a point, if it can happen to someone like him, it can happen to any man. Even despite all the proof here, this won't get the coverage it desevres, but if the roles were reversed, it would be a different story. That one song, "shes cold as ice" has truth to it. It's about time men realise woman don't care about them, were disposable, especially today, we are nothing but an atm, a walking credit card to them... something to give them entertainment and validation when they're bored, thats how most of them view us. That slogan "im an independent woman, i don't need no man" has merit because "im a man who don't need no drama" When we try to give them what they say they want and also what society says they want, it always seems that they always want the opposite of what they say and what society says they want, ive seen it time and time again, it's gotten to the point of it being morbidly hilarious but even then, they complain about that as well. That fickle nature is very annoying, and by god if a man calls it out, or complains about that as it is, they all pounce like a pack of hyenas... "lovely comments below please" I personally feel that heartfelt confession john said when she foolishly "and on purpose" hung up like most chicks do in these situations, even if she didn't, it would have fell on deaf ears from her over all irrationally irregardless. It isn't worth getting married guys, to her, you mean nothing, you never know the chick " especially if they're good at hiding it" till you put a ring on it, let alone an expensive one, it'll give em a pretty penny when they initiate a divorce over petty reasons after 10 years in addition to them getting half of what you own and alimoney to, sounds like a prospect with deminishing returns. In their minds, you're always the bad guy, especially if you call them out on their histronic inconsistent behavior, or even try to rationally come to an understanding, they'll just get more irate. Till then, its hard to keep your cool, then they say see, this is what im talking about, or they record what you say in your moment of weakness after you crack from their madness to paint you in a bad light. It ain't worth it guys, relationships aren't what they used to be, or even what society has conditioned you to believe they are to be... This sick society, espcially today has conditioned us to over romanticize, and even give into our naturally biologically ingrained imperatives as men to pedestal-ise an imperfect being "woman".... to our own detriment, our socity breeds emotional incontinence, especially when it comes to this, in fact our societys very development has continued as it has because of this natural desire to impress a woman, typically a wife, and to take care of our families " all natural structures that are being dimantled day by day, thanks to progressive far left beliefs" marrige isn't taken seriously in the west anymore when compared to other more traditional areas. It is put off later and later, this unhealthy relationship dynamic between the sexes, especially in the west has been tipped all the way to the maximum, only now, without guidance from lack of previous healthy masculin role models, things won't recover "masculinity is toxic"  Being a man is shamed today, while in certain sitautions were still expected to still be a man, its a big mess that will be our down fall as a species and society as a whole. Us men are exploited more and more, with every generation, it only gets worse as it builds on the previous dysfunction of the last. Marriage is so risky today why bother, a man can loose everything because of the natural love he has for a woman, that most of the time she doesn't have for him in the same way, this video is one of many things showing this reality, its sad, but a good thing to accept, you wonder why men today go their own way and check out sometimes indefinitely. A shame a successful man like depp has to deal with such a woman, he ain't perfect, but i bet hes a good guy... Sadly there are far more woman out there who are like amber who always spin it on the man. It just makes it harder for people who really go though these things. Finally people are perhaps seeing that yes, woman can be abusive to, sometimes "even more so, its easier for them to erase their tracks" not always should they be believed just because they are a woman, especially without a deeper look into the matter. Yes, woman do get abused but SO DO MEN, and it hardly gets reported, Jonny is lucky to have had the thought to record this. A man, just because of his usual bigger size and strength shouldn't always be guilty before being proven innocent. It's eaiser for a woman to be abusive twords a man and get away with it because of their unspoken privileges in this society that they oftentimes refuse to see they have. They usually get away with abusing men and the men who fight back get shamed by the system. That is very toxic. I'M glad johnny is getting justice for this which is something that typically doesn't happen. Many woman genuinely think like amber heard does, that men won't be believed if they speak up, often times, its true, they think that they can get away with anything just as she so proudly stated on that phone recording and even with that proof, the world tried to turn a blind eye against it, so many woman out of spite falsely do things to themselves like amber did to johnny and then call the police, they won't even take a second look at it and haul the man away, yes some woman are really that nuts to put men in a bad position to take advantage of the system. Even when i was younger ive seen it as well. Thankfully she hasn't won here like many do, if it wasn't for johnny being who he is, and being loved by so many and even having past exes come in support of him I doubt he would've made it out on the other side. Any man who tries to start a domestic abuse shelter for men always gets shut down, any man that typically tries to take a stand against how un fair the system is twords them typically gets shut out and called every name in the book by hard core feminists. It isnt oppression to want equal treatment on this matter, it isn't oppression to want male only help, if y'all can have it why can't we? comment: Wow, disturbing to hear this narcissist (Amber- I hate that we share the same name) speak to Depp. You can hear all the casebook tactics they use; deflection, lying, gaslighting, etc. I remember when the story first came out and Depp was painted the abuser it just didn't sound right to me. I never liked her, but as a survivor of domestic abuse myself, I know how important it is to believe victims and give their story a chance. I told myself that in time the truth will come out and we'll see if she's telling the truth or not. Based on everything we just heard, I think it's safe to say that she's either a complete liar or exaggerated fights they had to be a victim. He obviously had/has a drinking problem, and maybe she's the cause of it, maybe not. Maybe he lashed out at her while drunk without meaning to and she blew it out of proportion. With the whole phone incident, maybe she asked him to throw her her phone and it accidentally hit her face and she claimed he did it intentionally. Accidents happen. Who knows, maybe he was drunk at the time and his reflexes were off. Either way, what she says and doesn't say here is very telling and screams narc. I'm calling it. Kind of odd that Depp kept talking and didn't realize she disconnected the phone. At first I thought was planned since he's obviously recording the call, but if you listen carefully to him he sounds a little off and slurs his words a little. I think he was either drinking or smoking some weed while taking to her. You can even hear his lighter at one point. I think overall it says a lot about his character for trying to save her reputation and give her an out and try to resolve peacefully. Even after all they've been through, his name and reputation tarnished after he was branded an abuser, he still says he loves her and is believable when he says that. I think she knows that and tried to take advantage of that. Such a shame, the whole thing. If she's lied about everything, then shame on her! Especially for being the poster child for #metoo! Some of us have actually been victims and all the victims of abuse out there deserve to be heard and believed! Lol her last name is "Heard." Ironic.

comment:
Characteristics of Abusers:
Keeps track of what you are doing all the time and criticizes you for little things.
Constantly accuses you of being unfaithful.
Prevents or discourages you from seeing friends or family, or going to work or school.
Gets angry when drinking alcohol or using drugs.
Controls all the money you spend.
Humiliates you in front of others.
Destroys your property or things that you care about.
Threatens to hurt you or the children or pets, or does cause hurt (by hitting, punching, slapping, kicking, or biting).
Uses or threatens to use a weapon against you.
Forces you to have sex against your will.

Like most if not all Progressive Christians, I support separation of "church" and state, freedom of/from religion, and anti-discrimination laws for LGBT people and Atheists/non-religious people.

comment:
*I am **_really_** glad Depp has these recordings:Without them, he would have been totally and perpetually, fucked.  Amber Heard is one of the best public examples I have ever seen of Borderline Personality Disorder ("BPD").  BPD'ers are pathological narcissists, who are not only capable of convincing people around them of their delusions - they are often capable of convincing **_themselves_** of their delusions as well.  There is only one realistic, public example of BPD behaviour that the general public is likely to be familiar with - the female lead character in trhe movie "Gone Girl". "Gone Girl" is seen by the general public as a mere horror story, but it's so much more: it is an **_completely accurate_** representation of how BPD'ers think, plan, and operate on a day to day basis.  If you keep the movie BPD'er in mind, and then keep that image in your mind while listening to these recordings, it will be immediately obvious what is really going on here.*


*The line that most people are zeroing in on here is Heard describing how nobody will believe Depp because she is a small 100 pound woman, and he is a much bigger male - but that isn't the line that has the real evidentiary value here.  The line that makes me **_know_** what is really going on here is Depp complaining that "you aren't real".  This is the one universal reaction to BPD'ers by their victims (and BPD'ers leave extraordinary trails of broken people in their wake - it is THE trait they are best known for.  Those piles of broken people they leave behind them got "broken" by dealing with the BPD'er on the terms of the BPD's **_created_** personality.  These personalities are literally **_created_, knowingly, deliberately, and with great care, to guarantee that _every_** person they have ever had **_any_** non-trivial interaction with is left  behind looking like an abuser, because the BPD personality **_requires_** martyrdom to "exist".  I have "exist" in quotes, because no two people will ever see the same person: BPD'ers present as completely different, carefully **_tailored_** personalities to each individual they encounter.  It is this chameleon like characteristic that leaves their victims with the crushing and profoundly difficult to  assimilate realization that no matter how long or "well" they think they have "known" the BPD'er, or on what terms they **_think_** they have known the BPD'er (as wife, friend, acquaintance, even as a casual neighbor or possibly a mere stranger), the ultimate fact - the **_truth_** is that they person they **_thought_** they were dealing with **_literally_** does not exist, and has never existed, other than the carefully constructed and displayed fake that was custom built and presented to each individual.  It is a **_literal_** truth that **_nobody_** has ever met the the person they **_thought_** they knew, because that person literally does not, and has never, existed in the first place.  Again, this is perfectly illustrated in Gone Girl by the dozens of different faces she has so carefully created and displayed to each person she had **_any_** interactions with - and no two personalities are the same (outside of being completely artificial constructions designed specifically for each individual person she interacts with).*

comment:
This also reminds me so much of every argument with my ex. I was patient, calm and kind while she was just pushing and pushing, saying one extremely mean thing after another, despite my pleas to stop. Eventually, I'd finally lose it and she always only remembered what I said in reply. Total amnesia about the things she said to provoke me.

The whole thing made me very careful about getting into another serious relationship and I used to be a very romantic guy. When women complain about how all men are fuck boys they don't realize that there are a lot of good men that turned into that because of terrible experiences with women who they loved and went out of their way to be good to. It's not good to project past relationships onto new ones but something this bad really makes you wonder if another serious relationship is worth it.

Although having listened to this, as verbally abusive, delusional, irrational and narcissistic as my ex was, she still seems way nicer and more sane than Amber. At least she didn't hit me with pans or throw things at me.

BTW, my current girlfriend has been absolutely amazing so far (6 months) but I can't help it but have it in the back of my mind that she's playing nice to rope me in and one day I'll see the real her. I try to make that thought go away but it terrifies me. Women can act like they love you so well that it's very hard for a man to tell that it's all an act. As much as many men can be assholes, at least you know where you stand with them. They show their true colors very quickly. Women have the capacity to treat you incredibly well for years only to constantly plot to destroy you behind your back. My ex always told me that if things don't work out we'll part amicably and maybe even remain friends. When it actually happened I bent over backwards to make that happen but she responded with trying to ruin me. How can I believe another woman now when things are good? Especially with the way the laws are in US. The more financially successful person (not necessarily but usually a man) always gets fucked in the divorce. A lot of people will say just sign a prenup but what they don't realize is that these things are not full proof and the judge still has a lot of influence on whether it would be followed. I actually got off pretty easily. Have heard some truly awful stories. No wonder men in US don't want to get married anymore.

Sorry for the length. Listening to this just brought up a bunch of things I wanted to say. I'm sure I'll get some replies that will blame me and call me an asshole but you don't know me. I was unbelievably nice and loving to my ex. Did more for her than any guy before or will ever do again. And for that, as appreciation, I got never ending verbal abuse. I really hope that things will stay as they are with my current girlfriend. She says that she doesn't even understand how my ex could stay mad at me for more than 5 minutes.

comment: Let me start by saying this, I am a feminist, you know, the real kind. One who understands that the core of true unbiased fair feminism is equality and fair treatment for ALL sexes, period. The people who simply hate on men and are just ready to blindly blame them in cases like this simply because of their gender are fake feminists who have no real credibility and I absolutely hate them since they hurt the feminist movement so much. I say this because I feel it's important for a true feminist to speak up and add my two cents to the ongoing dialogue, especially in such cases, and make it clear that my intention as a true feminist is to be fair to everyone and men need to be heard as well since we as women can't expect men to listen to us if we don't listen to them, ideally this should be the intention of everyone, but we don't live in an ideal world. The whole notion that men are more violent than women in general is crap and a gender stereotype we need to break and fight against, among many other gender stereotypes pertaining to men, women, trans people, etc. Hearing each other out and being fair to each other is what we need to do to bridge the gap between men and women and repair the society to make it a truly equal one, as a true feminist that's my goal and I hope I'm not alone in this fight. It's true that majority of the reported cases of domestic abuse towards women from men are true, but that doesn't mean all of them are. Unfortunately there are women in this world who do take advantage of the benefit of the doubt that this society gives them because of their gender, because not all women are naturally good and sweet and nurturing nice people, another gender stereotype we need to break. Women can be violent too, and men DO get abused as well, just not in the same numbers as women. These are the ugly realities of the world we need to realize. In today's times, as mostly it's always been, it's even harder for a male victim of abuse to come out as one than a female victim because they are met with such steep skepticism because of their gender. That shouldn't be the case at all, abuse is abuse, no matter where it comes from or who's at the receiving end of it, regardless of their gender or their physical size for that matter. The fact that Johnny just happens to be a man physically larger than Amber does not matter if Amber threw a vodka bottle at him hard enough to seriously hurt him. Any sharp object can be used as a weapon to hurt someone, especially someone not prepared for the attack. There have been cases where kids have used sharp objects to murder their parents who were physically larger than them, it's still murder that actually happened. The person who INITIATES an altercation, especially using a sharp object, is the abuser, and the person at the receiving end of it is the victim, regardless of their gender or size. And after the altercation has been initiated on the other end, if the victim retaliates with a physical response, that's self defense and standing up TO the abuse on the OTHER end, not abuse at THEIR end. Plain and simple. Here, Amber clearly seems to be the abuser who initiated the altercation and seriously hurt Johnny, and Johnny is clearly the victim who seemingly only ever retaliated to her initiated attacks which is NOT abuse. What AMBER did is abuse. And from what we are hearing in this audio, Amber is not only a physical abuser but also a mental and emotional abuser and a clear manipulator who's trying to play the victim when she isn't one and trying to gaslight Johnny into thinking he's not the victim when he clearly is one and turning around and accusing HIM of abuse to convince him of her victim-hood, all signs that point to a narcissistic personality. And if Amber truly is a narcissist, this is probably just scratching the surface. This probably goes far beyond just physical abuse as narcissists are some of the most poisonous creatures on the planet who destroy their victims from the inside out and the way Johnny says he kept loving her and deluding himself with that love like it was all made up in his head and kept giving her chances before since he said this is the LAST chance he's giving her, he sounds like the perfect victim for a narcissist to get their constant narcissistic supply from, UNTIL he finally opened his eyes to her true ugly form in the end and decided to go to court after that since all of his delusions of her were finally broken and then she went straight from accusation to panic mode once she realized she couldn't play him anymore as her game was about to be busted and her constant source of narcissistic supply was gonna be taken away, which is the thing narcissists desperately need to survive on, it's like a drug to them they are hooked on. Such narcissism should be ACTIVELY fought against and that's why unlike most I actually don't think cancel culture needs to die, just improved so we stop jumping to conclusions without knowing the whole truth and start fairly canceling the right people for the right reasons, so that the wrongdoers like Amber Heard know that there WILL be consequences for what they do and they can't get away with it. Amber Heard needs to be cancelled and Johnny Depp needs to be given justice. Honestly, I was pretty much convinced of Johnny's innocence when both J.K.Rowling and David Yates came out in his support before Fantastic Beasts : The Crimes Of Grindelwald released and decided to keep him on for the rest of the franchise since I trust their judgement and morality. Johnny Depp said that he felt bad for her needing to defend him and that she (Rowling) had seen proof of his innocence, now we know what he was talking about. I applaud him for not just being strong enough to finally open his eyes and standing up to Amber Heard's abuse towards him, however long it took him cause it's not easy to do, but also for being smart enough to record their conversations. And say what you want about J.K.Rowling, but she would have never stood by someone whom she didn't know for sure was innocent and really did deserve her support after seeing the evidence to prove it. I was right in trusting her and David Yates, it turns out, not that I ever doubted their judgement and credibility. Now Johnny's credibility has been proven as well, hope he gets justice.

comment:
What do you know... she was right too. Weird that... it's almost like women know exactly how domestic violence is viewed by the public despite feminist attempts to portray things as if nobody ever cares about it.

I really want to say this, because I feel it absolutely pertinent for all to hear. We have collectively created a system that has empowered this abuser to further her abuse far beyond what she could have ever done were it not for our inability to recognize abusers like her. We have given cover to her, we have covered up for her the very possibility that she might be capable of abuse, and she knows it. Others know it too. There are undoubtedly many others who have done as she has, but weren't caught because most incidents like this aren't recorded.

So just think, there are right now an unknown and unknowable number of abusers and victims just like like this going unnoticed because we collectively have decided this is a gendered issue and not a genderless one. How many do you suppose that is? How many evil people like this do you suppose we've given cover to? How much abuse have we been complicit in? Are we not unwitting accomplices to it? I'd say no, we are not unwitting accomplices, we are willful accomplices. We hear rumblings about male victims and female purpotrators and we start doing backflips to try and dismiss them. We know cases like this happen, we cannot deny that, but every time one does, even this case with irrefutable evidence, people deny them. There are people right now trying to refute these recordings because they cannot accept the truth.

That is our collective fault for allowing our culture to be this way.

author: Miss New Look

comment:
22:33 When he said you don't exist, you are a made up thing in my head... that is the final step necessary for a victim of abuse to break free, you have to realise that the person you thought you loved the person you fell for was a fantasy, a role they played to gain your trust, it's a role that is brought out again when necessary just to keep you believing that is the real them and they are still in there, it's a control mechanism to stop you leaving when they have gone too far but eventually you have to wake up and see it for what it is and that leads you to accept that if the person you think you love doesn't exist, _never_ existed, then why would you stay and put up with all this crap from a cruel and conniving person that if you had really known you would never have fallen for... hearing this conversation is like watching that metamorphosis take place, that is what is happening though, it's why he goes from _I love you so much_ to _you don't exist_ that is the process he is going through at that time, the realisation that, yes I was in love but I wasn't in love with a real person. The process of coming to terms with the fact that you fell for such a trick, you were manipulated and it was premeditated. This makes you question how you could have trusted someone who is so cruel and you feel like there is something wrong with you that you didn't see it for what it was and you feel that you were a fool to fall for it, it means you have issues with trust but not so much trusting others, that will heal with time, *the real damage done by abuse is that it makes you feel like you cannot trust yourself* and _that_ takes a lot to come back from. 
I remember when this story first broke that I just didn't believe her, having gone through this process myself, there were inconsistencies in her story and I just couldn't relate to her and I should have been able to because of my experiences, I remember mentioning that I had some issues with these inconsistencies in her story and people had a right go at me and said that as a victim of this kind of abuse myself I should believe her _no matter what_ and I should be on her side... but that cannot be how we do things, ultimately *we have to be able to ask questions because otherwise the truth doesn't matter and where abuse is concerned the truth has to matter because without truth how can there be trust and trust is precisely what is damaged by abuse.*
Sorry I know that was a little long and convoluted but hopefully I got there in the end ;)

comment:
Finally someone has no choice but face her LIES after she falsely accused a man of being physically abusive. It's all too common in today's society, but as crazy as that bitch is, non-celebrity men pretty much  NEVER catch a break after being falsely accused. As ridiculous as Amber Heards accusations sound, what recently happened to my best friend is far worse. And its ALL 100% true.

A couple months ago my best friends ex wife purposely backed into his car while they were both pulled off to the side of the road. Right after backing into him she called the cops, blatantly lied, and said that HE rear ended HER and claimed he was "trying to kill her." He was already speaking to a 911 dispatcher the exact moment she backed into him, and he immediately verbalized to dispatch "she just backed into me" then left to avoid the situation escalating, but stayed on the line with dispatch as he Initially called 911 to report her driving while belligerently  intoxicated, and doing so with their 6 year old daughter in her back seat. Guess what both of their calls resulted in? 

No police followed up with what he reported, instead they sent multiple officers to my friends house, who proceed to forcefully arrest him and take him to jail. No witnesses, no proof. Just her word (that of a felon with a history of violence and drug use) was enough to put him in jail. No questions asked. His son who was with him in the passenger seat during that entire incident, was begging the cops to listen to his story, about his mom lying to the cops, being an abusive alcoholic and drug addict, and intentionally backing into his dad's car. He then watched the police with pistols drawn arrest his dad and take him to jail like some violent criminal. He's now facing multiple felony charges on behalf of her falsifying a police report. 

My best friend is easily one of the most compassionate, caring, selflessly hard working fathers I've ever known. He'd never hurt his family or jeopardize his marriage. Though at the time of this incident, his wife had recently left the family, beside their daughter who she decided to bring with her on her drunken heroin and meth induced escapades. Of course without telling her husband, so she could continue to drink relentlessly, inject heroin, and inject Meth with her new boyfriend who had moved in with her at her mom's house. 

I know this sounds too crazy to be real, but it's all 100% true. Much has happened since then, almost ALL of which is just as insane as the rest of this fucked up story. 

 It breaks my heart to see him and those innocent kids have to go through the pain and heartbreak that this psychopath is so selfishly inflicting on them. But neither I or him can do a thing about it. Law enforcement, and other members of the justice system alike pass judgement on him because of her claims. Almost immediately after saying the words "physical abuse" it was nearly instantaneous how supporters from women's shelters showed up on her behalf in court to discredit the father. All done without any evidence or explanation, her claims were all anyone seemed to require to condemn an innocent man.

If any lawyers/judges or anybody else associated and experienced with stuff like this can offer insight or offer help for him and these poor children we'd all be eternally grateful for any help that can be provided.

Or, if anybody wants to hear more updates before and after of this Jerry Springer-esque ridiculousness feel free to ask!

comment:
Ever since the first articles came about Johnny being (extremely) abusive to Amber I always mostly ignored them. I never believed them, (usually I don't ignore them because even if they might be fake they should be taken seriously in any case, the same with rape or sexual abused victims) but because Johnny never did anything to his previous partners or close people. (also I know, I don't know them irl) And yes I know people can be unpredictable but the person I ALWAYS thought was the true evil in this relationship was Amber.  Women can be extremely abusive to men, the same way as men can be extremely abusive to women. It happens to other men too and it should be treated exactly the same way as if a man was the abuser?

The thing that irritates me the most is that Amber is just ignored, her reputation intact, gets to do movies and interviews meanwhile Johnny gets dumped from Disney and almost from Fantastic Beasts and lots of other stuff. His reputation getting worse and worse. Johnny deserves love and support because what he's going through is probably hard as hell and I'm fearing for his mental health.. Let's hope it will  eventually be peacefully closed like he wished. (Also with Amber being in prison ahem ahem)

comment:
She is clearly threatening him here. 
All she cares about is herself in this tape.
She clearly doesn‚Äôt care if she ruins his reputation, and she pretty much threatens to do that here.
The crying is to look innocent. She‚Äôs terrible.
She pretends to be a victim while she is aggressing.
It is somewhat evident that she has borderline personality disorder.
She‚Äôs worried about herself being hurt, but she clearly doesn‚Äôt give a damn about the fact she physically hurt him.
She‚Äôs awful.
She is so manipulative, that she basically comes out and tells him that she is going to drag his name through the mud, because she is concerned about her own public reputation, and that‚Äôs pretty dirty, considering that she was violent towards him.
In someways, she is clearly sociopathic.
The only thing that makes her not sociopathic is that she has this histrionic affect. Sociopaths have a flat affect.
It is just striking to me that she has no conscience.
And we‚Äôve seen that through all three videos.
She blames the fact that she is going to drag Johnny Depp through the mud on her lawyers, as if they‚Äôre not working for her. 
She never takes responsibility for anything.
She tries to control and isolate Depp by goading him, saying he is gay.
This is how she tries to manipulate him and keep him away from his male friends.
She tries to shame him.
Filing a police report that is fake is illegal.
They should have put her in jail for orchestrating this press stunt.
She even says that wants to file a police report, and use the court instead of a mediator, to revamp her reputation, and to try to cover up her violence.
That is just taking advantage of the courts and the police, and of course, Depp, who is clearly at his wits end here.
While getting more publicity, by her writing an editorial in the New York Times, claiming that she‚Äôs a victim because she doesn‚Äôt have her privacy. 
What a nutcase.
It‚Äôs so disgusting.
She further manipulates him by claiming everything he says is an ‚Äúattack.‚Äù
When she claims she was afraid he would hurt her, he is so stunned at this histrionic claim, that he has to ask her if she really believes what she‚Äôs saying.
Meanwhile, she clearly doesn‚Äôt care if she hurts him.
I don‚Äôt think there‚Äôs any doubt she has borderline personality disorder. 
I am shocked that the therapist didn‚Äôt tell her that.
When she claims in the other tape that she gets ‚Äúscared‚Äù when he leaves is a dead giveaway.
The classic fear of abandonment she has, and her rage that is out of proportion with what is going on, are two criteria used by psych workers to diagnose BDP.
She exhibits more borderline criteria, so I wonder what kind of therapist they went to.
This comment is long enough, but I can‚Äôt understand how she didn‚Äôt get diagnosed, because it‚Äôs so glaring.

comment:
Johnny Depp is an empath (many actors are - it can be very useful for the profession) and (while I've only heard snippets and not followed this religiously) Amber Heard is a narcissist.  This is the empath/narcissist dynamic clearly demonstrated.  Every empath wants to be loved but will put the wants and needs of others before their own; every narcissist wants to be worshipped and will always project inwards, unable to put themselves in the shoes of others thus not caring about any harm they cause.

I was narcissistic in my first relationship I would realise looking back, although there was no violence involved - I just genuinely didn't care for the girl.  When she said it was over I said, 'Okay.'  She asked me if that was all I was going to say and this prompted crocodile tears - believe me I cringe when I think about it.  But I was an empath raised by narcissists and this was my first relationship so I suppose I deserve some slack, I had to learn myself out of the nonsense I'd been fed about girls (by the narcissistic women who raised me) all my life.

It is a sad fact that empaths have a habit of attracting narcissists, or rather narcissists target empaths.  People pleasers (which every empath is brought up to be usually as the result of the influence of a narcissistic parent), that's what a narcissist needs; open to manipulation, flexible, worshipping them on their knees.  3 in every 20 people (according to experts) may be narcissists, by my experience that's an underestimate.

They're out there folks, among us, wolves in sheep's clothing; and they've been there for the long time, perhaps since the beginning of time.  Mention the word 'narcissist' to a police officer (in the UK anyway, haven't tried with a US cop) and they frown and shrug and ask you what that has to do with anything.  Now the reason that's astounding is that a great deal of criminal activity is performed by narcissists, take Dr Harold Shipman - psychotic narcissist, has to be, it's the only explanation for murdering 200 women you were appointed to care for.  Nurse Beverly Allitt, murdered babies in the hospital because she could, it was a power trip just like Shipman's murders.  The nature of narcissism, the lack of emotional empathy, makes narcissists (I believe) more prone to criminal activity than the rest of us - they don't feel the pain of others they just enjoy causing it.

Now I'm not calling Amber Heard a psychotic narcissist - she's probably just a sociopath - I'm just trying to make the point of what she is and advise everybody, whether you're an empath or not, to be on your guard for narcissists.  You don't want a narcissistic relationship, you don't want to love someone who has no feelings for you, it will destroy you and that person couldn't care less - they'll play the victim and everyone will blame you.


Ask your partner to tell you what your best qualities are, insist that they concentrate on personality qualities ('Beautiful' doesn't count).  If they don't have an answer or struggle or tell you to go away and stop bothering them, what does that tell you about how they feel?  It doesn't matter how many times nor how often they say 'I love you,' they're just words.  If you want to know if someone loves you it's written in the eyes, it's written in their behaviour.  Granted not everybody can read eyes, I'd say learn to read eyes for your own sake.  At least keep an eye on their behaviour, ask yourself what recently has demonstrated their love to you. 



Stop necessarily believing everything your partner says.  People lie, narcissists lie constantly, they live by lies.  Watch their eyes, does it feel like they're lying to you?  Can they tell you about yourself?  Do your feelings matter or only theirs?  If you answered: 'Yes', 'no' and 'only theirs' you may well be in a narcissistic relationship...



This essay was brought to you by Francis X. Lord, and this is the end of my narc bashing for today.
author: Francis X. Lord

comment: So I'm just going to comment here on the part where the host of this video claims that she admitted to using make-up and taking photos to look like she's abused - making sure his and her friends see the pictures, then sit on them for years so that she can use them later as fake evidence against him. That isn't what she said at all.  She said that there are two unbelievable choices the public and the court would need to believe to exonerate Johnny from her claims of domestic violence: A) that she got the bruises from being a part of a secret fight club, or B) she spent three years making up fake claims, used make-up, etc to use against him at some point later on.  She is pointing out the ludicrousness of both ridiculous ideas.  So at this point, she is NOT admitting to anything at all.   To be clear - from the word go, I always believed she was full of shit in her claims since the bodyguards and the cops had very different stories than she had about that infamous night this all came to a head.  Johnny has been known to be a guy who will break or damaging THINGS when frustrated or angry but has never struck a woman before (according to his ex-wife and all of his ex-girlfriends who have made public announcements about this).  She, however, has shown herself to be an abuser and someone who has tried multiple times to try goad him into hitting her on camera or while on the phone.

comment: i have been in an abusive relationship and the thing is that they don't start this way. if someone just did to you out of the blue you would be like this is crazy and leave. they pretend to be someone else for so long. that is why he says she isn't real. but during that time where  you think they are someone nice and decent they leave little bits here and there of manipulation and fuck with your head. eventually you start to doubt yourself, they make you believe their fucked up world, even if just for a second. when they flip out and do some abusive you want to end it but then they are sooooo sorry and they promise to change. my ex even agreed to get on meds and see a therapist. i use to sit outside and watch em walk into the office before i drove away for months. i know it takes a long time for meds to work so i told myself i had to be patient. come to find out i was driving back and forth for nothing because the therapist never even knew about my ex. i didn't find out until after i left though. its some fucked up shit i am just glad i got out of it before it went too far. but it was the cheating that got me.

How are people twisting this so wildly?!?! He‚Äôs gaslighting and love bombing her this whole conversation. Of course he‚Äôd act calm if he knows he‚Äôs recording her üôÑ. She‚Äôs saying she has proof, and saying ACCUSING her of using makeup etc would be crazy. Because it is!! Just wow. Are we listening to the same recording?!

She didn‚Äôt say she ‚Äúwanted to knock him off his feet‚Äù she said she couldn‚Äôt (in other words: LIKE HE CAN to her). There‚Äôs so much nuance here that is being overlooked and everyone is being so obtuse?! This is blowing my mind. She‚Äôs saying it‚Äôs wild for him to excuse abusing her by saying she ‚Äústarted it‚Äù which is TRUE. In the end, his tone was very scary. This is really upsetting how people are interpreting this call as ‚Äúproof‚Äù she lied. proof how?!?! 

Every day I become more and more convinced this life is a simulation wth.

author: Jenae

comment:
That's not what she says at all.  He tells her (4:28) not to take this to court because it won't be good for either of them and "defending yourself by throwing someone under the bus is not going to look good."  She responds saying that it [the court case] wouldn't be about that - meaning people would see she's not just throwing him under the bus.  Then she explains what it [the court case] would be (5:26) : she says people would be able to come forward under the protection of law (where there is none for them now) to defend her; she has eyewitnesses and lots of evidence over the years to show that what she's saying is true. Then she tries to explain why his defense (that she was abusive to him) wouldn't hold up in court.  His claims that it was SHE who was abusing him can only exist under two circumstances (according to her): a) 5:49 - either she'd have to have been "in a secret fight club" (meaning she'd have to have superior strength and fighting skills that she'd have kept hidden from everyone all these years to be able to overpower him physically in order to abuse him), or b) 6:03 - 6:13 that she would have had to have been plotting this whole thing for 3 years, taking pictures and documenting everything to save it all up just for this moment.  She's saying that that's what he'd have to convince people of to claim that SHE was the abusive one, and that no one would believe him because she has not had anything to gain financially from it.  She goes into detail saying she has the people who can corroborate that what she's saying is true, and she has the text messages and time stamps as well as the confirmation from the make-up artists (I'm guessing who had to cover up her bruises) that there was, in fact, physical altercations.  Her evidence is real, and he'd have to get the court to believe that she had made all of it up and had been documenting fake injuries for 3 years if he were to win in court.

Not saying who's right or wrong, but just pointing out that I think people who are saying this is proof that she's at fault are misinterpreting what she's saying.

comment:
Now I can see that she just got scared for her life. And propably then asked her lawers how to prove that Johnny is an abuser, they told her to collect documents and record Johnny when he's angry. I can hear that she truly believes that he hurt her or could hurt her really bad. And then when there were not enought evidences she kinda freaked out but it was too late for a peaceful divorce. When she says that she is a woman and nobody is going to believe that she abused him, she means that she is not that scary cause she is a much smaller and weaker human then Johnny. And she worries that her reputation is gonna be destroyed and she's gonna lose roles or some deals., but Johnny instead is a much more famous celebrity and he has more fans and he will get his roles anyway. And she is scared that he will use his money power  and connetions to destroy her, that's why she sounds hysterically. 
I had a coworker, and we had a conflict at job. then he said that if I will ever complain about him to anyone, he is gonna hurt me really bad. I got so scared. And I freaked out. I wanted to leave my job, so scared for my life I was. Few months later he was fired cause he f**ked up at work and the company lost a lot of money because of his actions. But these months I was stressed af cause I couldn't even go to places where he was (canteen, some metting rooms, corporate events). I can see that Amber was scared but she didn't have enough evidences to prove that she was right. Maybe she overreacted, maybe Johnny was just a great plan to be rich and famous, who knows.

author: Kalissa H

comment: This brings up memories from a few years ago. My ex who will not be named never communicated with me and her parents, family and friends would literally make up lies about me. I was a stay at home dad, Id take care of the house, our son and provided what money I could. Anyway, we found out we were gonna become parents. We were scared. She ended up being diagnosed with ‚ÄúHelp Syndrome‚Äù. She almost died several times in the hospital. They had to perform an emergency C-Section. We stayed in the Hospital for 8 days. We get out and go home. She had PostPartum Depression. I wake up to our son crying in his bassinet, I walk up the stairs to the bathroom and find her passed out cold next to the toilet with a suicide note. I freaked out, an ambulance came. I went to my moms with my son. Shes in the hostpital for a week. The whole time her parents are literally spreading lies trying to get her to leave me. She gets out, and is having thoughts of harming our son. So she goes back into the hospital for 5 days. The whole time this is going on, im getting threats. About sleeping for 4 hours. Id sleep barely 4 hours a night. Id stay up having a hard time sleeping and video games were a coping mechanism. I never drank, I didnt do drugs. I know she worked, but I was always with our son and taking care of the house. Well anyway, she would say things at random ‚Äúyou know, one day im gonna leave you and take our son from you‚Äù mid conversation. Then the one time I randomly kissed her, like most people do in relastionships. Then she says ‚Äúdont touch me‚Äù and I asked why? Then she says ‚ÄúI dont want to be touched and if you do, ill just tell people you raped me.‚Äù I had to deal with things like that constantly. Id over eat, never sleep, had constant anxiety attacks. Then months later I lost my newphew, lost a best friend do to a motorcycle accident, and my grandfather. Its like life decided to hit me all at once. I wasnt perfect, when Id wake up, Id immediately want a cigarette. I didnt work. I just collapsed under all the pressure. But I never once treated her like crap. I just sat there and took it. Id get threats from her father and mother. Hell, I told her mom about the rape thing her daughter said. Her reply? ‚ÄúEven if its a fake accusation, Ill still side with her‚Äù. All I did was take care of our child, the house and struggle with sleeping at night. I knew I should have left, but I was too afraid to leave, do to more possible backlash. I found out she was cheating on me for months with her coworker. Happened a few times where Id stay up all night, my son would wake up at 6. She got off at 6 in the morning and would send me a text saying ‚ÄúIm going to smoke weed for an hour with my buddies‚Äù. Id say ok, the baby just woke up but I got him. 4 hours would go by and she would just be getting home back from his place. Then Id nap for 3 to 4 hours and then take care of our son again. The day we broke up, it happened again. This time I woke up from my nap. To her dad and brother at the door talking about kicking my face in as Id go to the door. They liked getting our son on Sundays every weekend. They left and I told her ‚ÄúHey, your dad keeps talking about busting my face in again, I thought you talked to him about it?‚Äù She said I dont want to pick sides. I said im not asking you too, but maybe say ‚ÄúHey, I know you dont like my boyfriend, but could you not threaten him?‚Äù She starts screaming at me, which she has never done before, talking about how she hasnt loved me for over a year. We broke up that day, I left. Ive got better since then, but Im afraid of women now. I dont care if it makes me sound like a pussy. But Im scared of them now. I know she had PostPartum Depression, but I went through so much mental abuse because of it. And her family that just kept adding to it. I wasnt perfect, but never have I been treated so badly in my life. I know I didnt work much, I was dealing with Depression and Anxiety before this. But still. Its like I just ‚Äúwaited it out‚Äù. No matter what I said or did for her mattered. It got to point where I didnt feel any love at all. It was like I just cared about her No matter what. Times I thought about cheating myself, but never did. I just waited and dealt with it alone. It truly scares me the power a woman has over a man, with just a few words.

comment:
I never believed the extent of Amber's claims about Johnny. But I did think that if he happened to throw a phone at her then he must have been seriously provoked and I did have the feeling that she was a very antagonistic person. I have been on the side of a narcissist claiming that they were provoked into hurting me, with no provocation from me what so ever, so I tend not to trust provocation as a defense. However, in this case I think that anything Johnny did to protect himself, or if he did happen to snap on one occasion, would be justified  considering the amount of abuse he has been going through. 


Narcissists are very good at twisting the truth to make the world see them as the victim and their actual victim seem like the crazy person. It is a truly awful thing to go through. Seeing cases of this type of abuse playing out so publicly is really fascinating and although I wouldn't wish it on anyone, it is good that people will be opening their eyes to it and hopefully getting educated about Narcissistic personality disorder so they can hopefully avoid falling into a seriously abusive relationship.

comment:
I was actually wondering if he was intoxicated on the call. Don't get me wrong, I believe Amber is trash, and never felt right about her. But I've also been in a relationship w an alcoholic, and there's a voice that comes while intoxicated- for those that are long time or severe addicts. My grandfather was also an alcoholic, so I'm familiar with that type of voice. That's what I hear with Johnny, and it makes me sad (& Amber using his addiction to bolster her dv claims). 

My ex never learned that I could always tell when he had been drinking. Even if he wasn't slurring, it just did something to the drawl of his voice, pitch, the energy, etc. So each time, he'd call, thinking I wouldn't be able to tell. Anyway, I feel for Depp. Dealing w someone who's apparently a narcissist, plus the huge demon of addiction. I hope he finds true peace one day.

comment:
Her inflated statements at 9:19 (‚Äúmost solid evidence of domestic violence case we‚Äôve ever seen‚Äù) ... is a clear example of her flair for exaggerating and morphing minor incidents into catastrophic events.  When Johnny says ‚ÄúI love you‚Äù, notice how instead of acknowledging his loving emotions ... she spots a crack in his armour and immediately leaps for the throat, launching into a major manipulation fest.  She tries to gain ground and widen the wedge of his momentary vulnerability to strengthen her ‚Äúcase‚Äù against him.  A perfect example of the old adage: ‚ÄúLove is blind‚Äù ... he seems unable to recognize her extreme manipulation.   She doesn‚Äôt allow him to get a word in edgewise ... and takes advantage of his mellow personality where he is unable to match her nastiness.  She bulldozes right over every point he tries to make.

The public has already heard numerous audio tapes where Amber clearly admits to hitting, punching, smashing a door into him, throws a bottle at his face, seriously injures his finger.  We‚Äôve heard other audio clips where she hounds and provokes him when he tries to do the right thing and leave and remove himself from the situation whenever their arguments begin to escalate.  When he tries to leave, she screams, throws frantic tantrums to prevent him from leaving ... always trying to escalate things and break him down to gain the upper hand. 

It‚Äôs not surprising that there would be moments when he might lose his cool and might ‚Äòtoss a cellphone‚Äô, ‚Äòbreak a wine bottle‚Äô or ‚Äòtangle some jewelry‚Äô when he discovers that strangers have set up shop, a veritable jewelry manufacturing enterprise in his own home ... without first asking permission or letting him know that they had turned his condo into a jewelry factory.  Given these circumstances, it is fully understandable that there would be times where he would be provoked into a response.
author: galefraney

comment: Brian, congratulations for this very enlightening video! Your work is exceptional, as always! Johnny Depp owes you big time man and i hope he knows that! As for the audio, i have no words....it's so sad and heartbreaking! As a woman i feel shamed and disgusted hearing an other woman treats with such a cruelty and disrespect  a decent man,  whose only mistake was that he loved her ! Personally i've never believed her, i've never bought her story and i feel very proud of myself  now that the truth came out finally and as they say...truth is a bitch! I know people say she is sick, psychopath, narcissist etc. and maybe she is but for me she is simply a bad seed. A cold blood manipulator ready to do anything to gain money and fame nothing more, nothing less.As for Johnny, i've always admired him but after all these, the way he handled things, with such decency, such integrity, like a real gentleman from the beginning to the end,  has definitely and unquestionably earn my highest respect and love. I take my hat off to Mr Depp!

comment: I've worked in Law for over ten years and I've witnessed and helped many women with protective orders and restraining orders. Amber is a pathological liar who believes her own lies as truth, she is sticking by her false claims of abuse because in order for the courts to grant you a restraining order you need to state not prove, you were in fear of your life and had been abused by the defendant at least 3 times. I would love to see Amber Heard's complaint against Mr. Depp because she had to list three different instances of abuse by the defendant that is why she clearly says in the recording the three dates she had accused Mr. Depp of abuse. In most cases, a restraining order is granted either temporary or permanent and may be granted without the defendant present to defend himself/herself. Amber is a smart woman with a motive she knew by getting restraining order granted against Johnny she would have access to the penthouse they shared and he would have to stay away from all his properties she decides to reside or stay at. I hope justice is served because Amber Heard is an ugly human being and poor excuse of a woman fighting for women's rights while using them to her advantage to manipulate the media and public while ruining an innocent man's reputation. I hope she is charged with perjury and our Justice system starts recognizing female on male abuse.

comment:
I really do feel for Johnny Depp here. Maybe why I could never accept Amber hearts story of abuse being a victim etc. Was I could see things in her and the way she acted and spoke attitude etc. That reminding me so much of a woman I've known in my life and family for a little over 5 yrs my step mom. She fooled me and used me to get close to my dad again and my family. And after my mom pasted away 5 yrs ago from failing health at barely 75.
I thought having this person getting closer to our family and my dad was a god send. And I was actually the one hopeing they get closer and get engaged and married and when they did I welcomed her in with a open heart and arms. My mom didn't like her from the beginning and was a very good judge of character. I should have listened to her and been more careful with my heart.
But I was naive and foolish and still naively to childish and trusting in some ways then.
As she and my dad and rest of my ideadtmeadtte family got closer our friend ship between me and her grew more distance and things started happing. And of course I knew stuff wasn't ok deep down and etc. But because of some of my mental health stuff and problems I've had or even problems I had with my family. We we went great and exactly all sunshine and roses b4 she if emailed me that one fateful day yrs ago.
But thing between me and her grew more distant and one time shortly after she and my dad were married. That was when it was a light switch flipped and this other side to her. Came out her narrasitic passive aggressive and contronling always need to be the most important to my dad all the freaking time always and need to be in control of everything and everyone in the family esp me and to be always in my and every ones buesniss etc. But me iam not allowed to know even basic things everyone should like what's going on hope ppl are feeling etc over at my dad's and mainly hers house etc.
Losts of really bad crap and stuff and mental and emotional and verbal abuse and hate and negativity these past 3 yrs. It all started one week when we were all away from home staying someplace for a week and I had to share a room with the rents. I thought it would be no problem. I had no idea what I was in for all the hate and crap verbal stuff and her trying to control every single thing I did to the smallest detail. It drove me crazy. I hadn't ever experienced any thing like it b4 and her temper flew off the handle for nothing still does. I didn't even know or understand what I did wrong and I still haven't gotten a answer why. She scrutinize d everything I did. It was horrible and painful. But if I thought the next 3 yrs after that would still be like that but only get worse. Because she had lirreraly turn my family against me by stiring up old stuff about me and pertaining to me with them. And now some how iam the enenemys? Like what? And things are very extremely strained and toxic between me and my imeadte family now. And she is defently the reason why. It hurts to say this about anyone. Or to think someone can drive a wedge between you and your family like that. And it sounds like iam jealous or paranoid. Or thinking iam a victim or totally in docent or its cliche etc.
 But the last 3 yrs have been he'll. And now I have to totally legally separate myself from them and my dad . because of some of some disabilities I have. I have to have a rep payee. And he is still mine. But we hardly ever talk one the phone anymore. Even when I try to have any nice or pleasant talks with him or my sister. It's to much an imposition on them and all I hear is mostly almost always just negative and hateful stuff.
So iam done trying to stay connected or even wanting to try to stay being part of a family were iam not wanted or needed.
I mean yeah iam not ever in docent in anything and don't like saying iam a victim. Because with all the hurt and anger I feel I say stuff to them too. And that's not right ether.
But I do know ether from the way she was raised and all bad stuff she suffered lot of us do. But it doesn't give us at any age to be abusers or abusive about stuff to anyone. Including me to anyone. But my step mom who also claimed she got treatment for her mental health stuff too but has recovered more and used that to claim she is better than and more healthier than me. And iam still so un healthy and hurt ppl. Etc.
She is narrasitic or something much scarier or worse. And know one wants to be live that or see that but me. And iam scared she's just using my dad and family. I do hope she really does love them esp my dad.
I mean it's not ok to hurt me or anyone.
But me I can live and survive my family and my dad. That's totally unforgivable able.
Things have gotten so bad I would rather walk away and learn to heal and have my own life WIRH real other family that's still there for me and friends who are more like family to me and other friends and be happy. And let my imeadfamily live there own lives and be happy too.
I just I have Stockholm syndrome. Too because I still love my ieadmete family very much even my Step mom too.
 And she's in her 70s is frailer health than me and weighs far less than I do. Because even at 350 ish and now keeping losing and going down iam still obese.. So just because your small or weigh less than someone more frail even have physical disabilities etc. Docent mean you can be and absu e r or evil or what ever.
So mis heard should just. Shut the hell up. The me. Too moment is for everyone and should kick her out and distant them selves from her and all ppl like her. And the mainstream media and media in general need to bring the real truth of this story to light. Yes it might be embarssing for. Like MS heard and even my Step mom try reall ppl who are victims of any abuse are not belived and it does put all the hard work and advocacy back several yrs and we all have to start over again.

comment:
Please make more videos dude, I love the way break down of your analysis, I 100% agree with what you are saying. I show all my friends your videos, and I keep wanting more. I would like to hear more about some cases and opinions you have on different subjects, such as rape cases and domestic violence cases no only men but women as well because although amber I believe is the abuser in this case many times that‚Äôs not the case. It‚Äôs sick amber would still stand today to be a representation of DV. People who have actually gone through it, she makes people think back, I know some people who can‚Äôt listen to those audios because of how triggering they are. She‚Äôs clearly delusional, she doesn‚Äôt think clearly and believes her lie, which is a common sign of narcissism a lot of people say BPD but I say otherwise. People who say she needs ‚Äúhelp‚Äù I feel like are only people trying to justify this behavior just because she‚Äôs a woman. They didn‚Äôt do that with Johnny infact they are the same people who accused him and believe everything with very little evidence that came up. They didn‚Äôt say the same thing about him ‚Äúwell what if he has BPD.‚Äù You didn‚Äôt hear people saying that? It was he was a ‚Äúwife beater.‚Äù Not to mention him loosing his job. Jack Sparrow!!! He loved that role it honestly was one of the his best. He loves the fans that watched him because he knew jack was a good man and he set a good example for people. I hope that he gets his reputation back and his job on the set as Jack Sparrow. As for Amber if she does star in anything I don‚Äôt want to see it. I think she‚Äôs a vile person, I only think the times Johnny ever got violent or defensive was when she was constantly attacking and abusing him and most of the time he walked away like a responsible adult. Because he‚Äôs mature. He‚Äôs not a child, she‚Äôs a child in her mind in the state of things when it gets out of control. She only wants his money to be honest with you because let‚Äôs be honest she doesn‚Äôt deserve anything she got from him. Even his love and compassion as human being. She got to marry one of the biggest influencers in the world and she decides to milk this kind hearted man for his money and energy. 
He was abused, he was silenced for so long, he put up with so much. He finally said, you know what, I‚Äôm done, ‚ÄúI loved you for so many years.‚Äù You could hear the heart break in his voice. 
He only wanted to end things peacefully. She fucked with the bull and she got the horns. 

But like I said please make more videos, I wanna hear more.

I turned the tables on my ex. After almost 20 years of mental abuse and cheating I was a broken man who constantly thought about suicide. Only the thought of my son growing up without a father stopped me from doing it. I could not leave him in the care of this psycho. So when she again found herself a lover and I found out, I chased the bearded fucker off my property with a fucking Zulu spear and then I punched her so hard in the face repeatedly that I broke my wrist and bashed her laptop to pieces against the table. Her eyes looked like she was preparing for her own death. 
She said she was going to report me and I would never see my son again (Never say that when someone has murder in their eyes).
Problem is: Everyone knows me as the kindest person in the world. I help everyone, I never say no, I am good with kids and animals and have a spotless reputation. comment:
I don't know if this is just a universal female trait or whatever, but every woman I've known has been insanely blind to their own actions. Like cutting off someones finger and throwing a can at their face and then still think that they were somehow the one who is rightfully afraid. Every regular sane individual would understand that if the roles were reversed, that behavior would be horror movie level shit. But for some reason, women don't even seem to register the fact that if the men in their lives would treat them the same way they treat their men, she'd by crying about sexism and abuse to everyone who would listen within the hour.

This is not just with physical abuse, but even just in regular conversations, if I were to treat women the way exes have treated me, dear god. Just the constant barrages of "your'e standing in the way", said with cold careless voices, casually shoving you out of the way, forcing you to go out of your way to uncomfortably adjust your behavior in every minute detail just so that she would never have to feel any discomfort at all. Just generally not giving a crap about your feelings, or personhood in general. No compliments ever, just criticisms. 

"I am defending myself" while attacking him, emotionally manipulating him, emotionally abusing him, and talking about how she physically abused him. This is the worst sort of abuse, the kind where you are being abused, but your abuser actually tries to both make you feel like you're the bad guy, and portray it that way to the world. If you get punched, you can leave, the world is with you, but if you do this shit you fucking even take away their escape route, you isolate them (which in itself is abuse) by making the world hate them, and then you grind away at them day by day. And god forbid he ever stand up for himself, because then he's triple fucked, the abused is powerless, alone, vilified, and scared, and does not even have the comfort of knowing the world is on his side.
I truly believe the average woman would be considered to be physically and emotionally abusive had they been men.

author: Richard

comment:
My personal testimony with domestic abuse:

My ex had a severe alcohol problem, and he knew that if he was drunk he'd lose his inhibitions and become violent, yet continued to drink refusing to seek help. One night he carried a knife out of the kitchen, placed it on the table, and said he's going outside. I told him: "if you go outside in this state of mind I have to call the police, because this is dangerous". He looked at me and asked me: "you would call the police?" I said: "yes". Before I even finished my response, he flew to my throat. I was cornered between the table and a wall with a grown man closing two hands around my throat, looking down at me with pure rage. He was increasingly adding pressure and wouldn't let go. So I bit him. I bit him hard in the lower arm where I could reach. I recall that I had this moment i thought "he isnt letting go, I'm about to puncture his skin if I bite any harder, why isn't he letting go?". Once he let go, I was so dazed and confused, I went to bed. The next morning I wake up and I have texts threatening to kill my father. It's 10am and he is still drinking, possibly didn't sleep. I throw the remaining liquor through the drain of the sink. As soon he sees me do that, he attacks me in the kitchen and presses my face on the stove. I was crying and saying I will call police now. He tried to switch tactics: "baby, you're confused. I love you. I'd never hurt you on purpose. You need to calm down and think, because you're confusing reality". He tried grabbing me but I shook him off, we wrestled with my phone, and then I called 911. 

The moment he sees I am seriously calling police, his face changed to stone cold. He leaves without a word. He puts on a fresh white shirt, and starts spraying on perfume. He puts gel on his hair and combs it. He makes sure he looks slick and presentable and leaves the house while I'm left rocking myself back and forth in the bedroom, in a state of half undress.

The police arrives. He waited on them in front of the house and tells them I have a borderline attack and shows them I bit him, and he removed himself from me out of fear of his safety. The police come up to me while I'm still rocking myself on the bed. They have been primed and ask me for my account of the situation. I tell them the full truth: how he threatened me and had a physical altercation and I bit him in self-defense, and I'm scared for my life. He did not admit to any assault, so I am arrested. 

I spend 10 hours in a holding cell with only a cup of water and a frozen cheese sandwhich, without a bra, with just some clothes I quickly threw on. He's in his holding cell constantly ringing them up because he wants pain meds, he wants more food, he wants a lawyer, it's unfair. I call them once for tylanol and they tell me "your boyfriend has been constantly asking for meds and this is not an apothecary, so you get nothing". He's walking past my cell to go to a toilet, limping dramatically, wincing dramatically, putting up an act like I seriously harmed him.

Prosecutors from the mayor's office arrive, and they hear me out and believe my story. So the mayor's office decides to grand me a restraining order against him. The police? I told them he was drinking all night, they never checked him for his alcohol percentages. They hold me accountable for biting him in self-defense, as he won't own up to his abuse of me. I am charged with domestic violence (him too) and told I need to get an anger management course. 

The next day I have to defend myself from this crap so i see a doctor and get photographs of my now developed bruises. I have bruises on my hips, on my jawline, my neck, an egg on my head. I put in new evidence, and another plea to please consider me a victim, and that I had a near brush with possible murder. If he had continued to strangle me, I'd have been fucking dead. 

But my ex is a borderline narcissist, and incredibly superficially charming and intelligent. My charge is lessened, but I still have a minor domestic abuse charge on me for this incident. My ex after this ordeal laughed "I told you they wouldn't believe you. I outsmarted the police, they are suckers. It's sad for you, but I feel on top of the world". 

Imagine. As a victim you are simply ALWAYS on the losing end with them. He fucked my life over and could've killed me.

Amber Heard talks almost exactly like the female version of him. It's scary. They are poison. They gaslight and use your empathy and love against you.

It took me 3 years of trauma counseling, ruined work opportunities, dropping out of college because I was too stressed from PTSD to leave my house. I'm just a regular nobody. Imagine the losses Johnny suffered, despite all his resources.
