author: One among Billions

comment:
Seems like borderline personality disorder.

Tumultuous temper, emotional over reaction/ dysfunction. Manipulation, psychological & physical abuse, deflecting, always the victim, blaming, never starting from the beginning only from where they were offended and not realizing the catalysts. 
Thoughts and emotions aren‚Äôt in sync with what‚Äôs happening.

Sometimes their actions incite reactions that are then used to solidify their thoughts and feelings.

The reality she is experiencing genuinely may not be what‚Äôs actually happening.

It is a monster of an insidious disorder. 
I‚Äôve been through it. 

It can drive a man insane. 

They truly look like monsters to the uninitiated but sadly if you fall in love with one you bare a lot as you try to save them from themselves as they also possess many truly wonderful qualities.

Johnny wouldn‚Äôt love her if she didn‚Äôt.

Just random speculation on my part though...

It‚Äôs sad all around because even when she is fucking up your life and unaware of how everyone else is beginning to perceive her, she is suffering also, she is a person.. another human just like you and me in misery and any attempts at mitigation with any hope of issue non reoccurrence has to start with them first being able to adopt a different perspective and that is often always taken as an insult or they feel taken for granted, not listened too, not considered etc etc.

Pragmatism, objectivity, rationality die in BPD relationships as the sufferer has certain triggers etc that generate certain emotions that then warp and contort incoming stimulus / their perception and with poor emotional regulation creates conflict.

I remember that point well, you get so overwhelmed with how out of proportion everything has gotten the only thing that comes to mind is to tell the person you love them with some hope they listen rather than view you as the enemy. 

You can go from being their literal God on earth to being someone they view that they may have to guard against quicker than you can blink.

Nightmare.

If I was aware of personality disorders, mental health issues etc. I would‚Äôve been able to save myself a lot of hurt.

comment:
The more I listen to evidence, the more I start to see that they were both abusive. Listen to the conversation, not the 'insights', which I find a little too biased for my taste, especially certain assumptions made that have no proof behind them. The difference is that Amber doesn't see herself as an abuser because she is a woman and, therefore, weaker. So, in her mind, Johnny is the sole abuser, which is fucking ridiculous. I was firmly on Johnny's side, but... he doesn't deny hitting her or anything. If you pay attention to the conversation without a bias, you can see that he's only referencing the fact that she was hurting him too. He doesn't say 'I never hit you', 'I never did this', or 'when the fuck did I hit you back?'. He just says 'I got a soda can thrown at my nose', 'you split my fucking finger'.

I don't know, it's just weird that in this conversation, he doesn't deny any of her accusations, such as that he had his security lie for him. The only time he denies anything is that she confessed to him that she was a stripper and THAT's the only thing he gets angry at? That she trusted him with that information and that he would never betray her like that. It's... odd. This whole conversation just sounds like they were abusive to each other, but now she's throwing all the blame on him when they both had a part in it. Might get hate for this, but it's way too fucking weird.

comment:
I am a man who was once in an abusive relationship with a woman.  While I never experienced anything close to physical harm, I was mentally/emotionally torn down by this woman in insidious fashion.  She would demean me, blame me for everything, lie about me to her friends and our mutual acquaintances, use me for sex, guilt me with my own frustrations against her, exploit my depression, and threaten suicide on multiple instances to make me stay with her.  She even went as far as to fake a pregnancy AND abortion by having me drive her to the clinic and make me wait in the car.  I was so beaten down by life at that point that I didn't care about anyone or anything and only saw my own suicide as a way out.  Luckily, I finally resorted to excommunication with her after coming clean to a good friend.  I've been free from her for almost a year and a half.

I say all of this because hearing these audio clips of Amber Heard is almost giving me PTSD.  She's saying many similar things, and acting with the same self interest, as my abuser.  This is seriously sick.  Having been through a toxic relationship, I sympathize completely with Johnny.  I've been there and tried to make things work peacefully, the same as him.  My only advice is to do exactly as I did: uproot yourself entirely from her life, walk away silently and never say another word.  It's the most effective.  I wish him the best.

comment: Essay alert- I knew from the start she was lying. I really feel for Johnny. My ex would gaslight me all of the time to the point that I felt that I was losing my mind, I felt so alone, i became terrified of going out with him because if I went to the toilet he would leave me, but he always made sure I had no money, no keys, no way of getting home. He would physically and mentally abuse me. But then there would be times when he would remind me of how he was when we first got together where he‚Äôd be funny and kind to me. The breaking point was when he returned home one evening, at this point we were married and I was pregnant, it all started after marriage and pregnancy. Earlier in the day he told me I had to get on my hands and knees to beg him whilst he was in the bath for money for ¬£20 to go for a meal with friends. He had taken full control of my money as we had a joint account and he cleared it from my savings and transferred it to his own account. I refused to beg him and walked away in tears. He was out playing a golf championship game that day and he would be home around tea time, he didn‚Äôt return home until 2am drunk with no money for the taxi. He swore and called me abusive names because I didn‚Äôt have money for his taxi and he had to go to a cash machine to withdraw money. He came home and carried on, I told him to leave me alone. He wouldn‚Äôt, he grabbed me and started to twist my arms, finally I stood up for myself. I had a bottle of water in my hand and threw some at him and walked away. Worst mistake I ever made. He attacked me worse than he ever had before. Beat me to the floor, I tried to get away and he tried to throw me down the stairs. I managed to stop him and then he went for me again and strangled me. The only reason he stopped, there was a knock at the door, the neighbour heard it all... I couldn‚Äôt believe how composed he was as he answered the door? I was in floods of tears and he was all smiles and friendly like nothing had happened? She told him she heard it all and I‚Äôm not staying, I didn‚Äôt know this lady, it was military housing and we hadn‚Äôt long lived there. She took me to hers and made me stay over and said that if I didn‚Äôt ring the police and report him that she would do. The morning came and she called the police because i was so scared I couldn‚Äôt do it. The police were amazing! An injunction was put on him and he was put in the cells for a few days and the police brought me food parcels. And over the following months I got the blame, I was told I deserved it. I was 6 months pregnant, I was harassed on social media by his friends telling me that they would beat me up if they saw me again. His dad said ‚Äúwell she‚Äôs still breathing she isn‚Äôt dead, it‚Äôs not like he threw her out of the window what is she complaining about‚Äù... all of this and I was made to look like the bad guy. There were plenty more incidents before this. And even to this day he still makes me out to be a bad person. When I divorced him he was a mess, but he had to put a front on. He knew he couldn‚Äôt tell his friends or family how he was feeling. Because they wouldn‚Äôt understand. Like a fool I was kind to him and helped him, I listened and got him through it. Even now ten years later he still says bad things about me, he‚Äôs shown his true colours a few times to my partner and he‚Äôs remarried now. Even to this day he threatened me because I forgot to pack our daughters school shoes in her weekend bag. He sees her around twice a month and he kept her a Sunday this particular day. I just wish she didn‚Äôt have to be near him, but that‚Äôs not how it works here. And she loves him dear, just thank god these two didn‚Äôt have children together!! I used to see life through rose tinted glasses and naively trusted everyone. He completely changed me.

Between Amber and Johnny, Amber had an agenda in the call - almost as if she was wanting the call to document her assertions and how emphatic she was in declaring them in a phone call.  She didn‚Äôt come off as sincere and at times she seems to be performing a script.  Johnny Depp, while he was guarded with his statements, came off as sincerely wanting both parties to bury the hatchet, nevermind the hit to his reputation.

Amber is evil.  And so are the so-called journalists who pounced on Johnny Depp with no other justification than the stupid injunction that we must believe all women.

The fact that she said:

 "Tell the world that I, Johnny Depp, A MAN, am a victim, and see how many people believe you."

 is just chilling. As if no one will ever believe that a man can be abused. She really does sound like an evil mastermind.

I'm a woman who was formerly seriously abused. My ex stalked me, tried to kill me, and left me for dead. Amber Heard is straight up evil. Her actions harm all women who have, or will be, abused. She's taking advantage of the Me Too Movement for her own nefarious purposes. It's extremely difficult for victims of abuse to speak out, but she has just made it even harder. Amber Heard clams that she is helping victims of abuse - she isn't. She is hurting us, and has harmed any progress that has been made in recent years.

She does not deserve to be in Hollywood. I, for one, will never pay to see any movie with Amber Heard in it, regardless of how badly I want to see it.

comment:
I loved how she panicked at the end, when she realized she had gone too far by accusing him of leaking intimate information to the press. Because - like she feared - he suddenly realized the truth, and her spell over him, or what remained, was now gone.

Having his integrity insulted made him see the reality: the Amber he loved was in his head. 

She was there in person, but his love for her was such that he had created a mental filter to make everything she did - no matter how wrong - appear right. Her selfish actions would appear adorable, her scowls would be seen as pouts, her cold stares would appear appealing, her wrong intents appear innocent  - and this filtered version, was the one he was in love with.

comment:
When Johnny said "you didn't exist" I think he was referring to her manipulation.  What he likely meant was Amber, or the idea of her,  was all a made-up facade to entice her victim. Narcissists¬†and manipulators have the tendency to "mirror" their victims, or reflect back the values and feelings and thoughts the victim shares. The victim ends up falling in love with themselves, essentially, and ironically enough. They fall in love with the idea of this person who resonates so deeply with them, on a spiritual level even. The abuser seems to understand everything they've ever thought or felt. It feels so passionate and deep. But it's fake. It's, as Johnny said "a made up thing in [your] head". 
When Johnny says "you didn't exist, you were a made-up thing in my head", I think he was certainly referring to her manipulation.

comment: Thank you so much for all of the time you've spent thoroughly investigating this case and trying to be unbiased and fact based. I can tell that if the evidence goes either way you'll defend the evidence and not the individual. Obviously the evidence is pointing to Amber being the abuser and with this video and the last video (and frankly all the videos and documented proof) I've noticed so many red flags that match up in my life with my previous abusers. She gas lights him and insults him all the time.  She admits abuse (hitting, punching him) and then says it wasn't that bad so he needs to stop "being a baby" because it wasn't as bad as he thought, she's only slapping him repeatedly,  not punching him repeatedly...she's essentially saying 'jeesh get over it Johnny, I'm not that bad'. My ex who used to punch me, throw me over tables, smash glass cups at my feet and heavy mens watches at my head that put holes in the wall...would tell me..."You act like I beat you everyday like some Lifetime movie. It's not even like that." Amber always deflects and changes the subject when he brings up a valid point of fault or abuse on her part and tells him that him walking away from a fight is a bad thing and that it's his fault that it escalates and him walking away makes her so pissed that she essentially has no choice but to attack him unless he just stays and let's her berate him with insults and hit him... than their lives would be better because that clearly would show her that he really wants to work it out no matter what she does to him. Hmmmm interesting. My exes would punch or choke me or tackle me (One tackled me like a football player tackling a quarterback while I was pregnant in our parking lot as I was trying to run away, covered my mouth so I couldn't scream and dragged me back to the house) and would say I'm lying...to my face...with bruises, scrapes and proof and he'd tell me it never happened. My other ex would punch me in the face, throw me over a table, This would be a one on one conversation between the two of us and he'd literally tell me that he didn't just hit me...he literally thought he was GOD enough to convince me that what happened didn't happen. Are you freaking kidding me!?! Or they'd cheat on me and I'd catch them in the act and they'd say I'm imagining things. I've been with 2 narcissistic sociopaths who are the most outgoing, personable, life of the party personalities and none of their friends or colleagues would've suspected them as abusers. I'm a woman and I know Amber is the abuser. Johnny always wants to walk away and disappear before things escalate...I get that. Johnny pushed her away or threw something back after a barrage of hits or things thrown at him...I get that. There's only so much one can take and Johnny has the patience of a saint to be honest. #JusticeForJohnnyDepp

comment:
Holy fuck she hits every single high note and earmark of a serial abuser.  She is fucking straight up Grade A toxic.  She gaslights him like a champ...or tries to at least.  She keeps telling herself the same lie hoping that she'll convince herself it's true.  OH MY FUCK she has all the tenets of a serial abuser.  You look up any hallmark of an abuser and she hits every one note for note.


She is the Exhibit A as to why campaigns like IBelieveHer and StandWithHer and other assorted fuckery is completely fucking abhorrent in today's society.  Why bullshit campaigns like that are cancerous like no one's business.  She even reminds us of that fact by demonstrating how easy it is to manipulate a jury/Judge by SIZE COMPARISONS.  "Oh you're so much bigger than me - who are they gonna believe?" kinda shit.  PROOF undeniable that she knows which buttons to push in today's society and why so many men are victims and will never get heard or get any semblance of justice...because gee, they're so much bigger than she was so he can't possibly be a victim.


This is why I have maintained from day one that I will NEVER believe anyone at face value.  No one.  I believe PROOF.  I believe EVIDENCE.  You show me that, and I will believe YOU.  Until then there's no power on this planet that will ever convince me or compel me to blindly believe "her" just because she says a bad thing happened.  I didn't then.  I wouldn't now.  I never will down the road.


Amber Heard is ass cancer with legs.  She is a walking plague on humanity.  The modern day Typhoid Mary.  Her and every other toxic fucktard like her.  Clever manipulators hiding serial abusers.


Listening to that exchange was fucking chilling in ways I can't hardly describe.  Chilling and so very cringe.  I hope he does get his day in court and I pray he rips her to fucking pieces publicly and in the most savage manner possible and permissible by law.  Just listening to him you can tell he has a pair of pocket Aces that she's unaware of (and one can assume they are the recordings we're all hearing).  He has something that he's keeping close to the vest.  Something she hasn't anticipated.  That's why he told her right from jump that if they do go to court, there's no turning back and it will end badly for her.  He clearly doesn't want that but at the end of that exchange, he knows the die has been cast and it's time for the gloves to come off.


She is in for the ride of her life and she will not enjoy a moment of it.  He will see to that.  She picked the wrong person to piss off and the wrong hill to die on.  He's gonna go for the throat in court and she will be flipping burgers at the nearest Chick-Fil-A in no time.  Her career is over.  She just hasn't got the memo yet.

comment:
She has got to be the dumbest female ever, not only is she lying her ass off and knows her days are numbered, but she was married to Johnny Depp! While I'm sure he isn't perfect and has his issues, everyone does. Instead of helping him thru his shit and letting him help her through hers, she decided to be a degenerate POS, kick him when he was down and then shit on his bed (sorry, couldnt help including this, lol, I find this verrrry telling of who she exactly is as a person). She is where so many other woman would love to be. WAS, anyway. This guy will prob never date again after what this broad put him thru, and I don't blame him. But if he ever did....Lol! ;P 
     Seriously, though, I've dated someone EXACTLY this. That long conversation on the last video was like listening to HIM all over again. Narcissistic people can't see past their own nose and I swear they all run by the same script. Exactly what my ex sounds like. It sends a shiver up my spine and reminds me of why I have stayed alone for a long time. That kind of manipulation and seeing someone for who they are, when the world see's someone else makes you feel like you ARE crazy, there IS something wrong with you. I dealt with that for yrs. And when everything broke, and the true person shone through and people start asking why you stayed so long...ummm, everyone told me how "lucky" I was, lol!! Plus, you always hope the person you met, the person they pretended to be for that first year or so, would come back and your always left thinking everything is your fault that is why....the more you try to understand, the worse they get. You dont realize until the end...they were NEVER going to be that person you met, because like Johnny said That person does not exist, so no matter what you do, that person isn't coming back, they were never there. 
       I dont know, it just does something to you that makes you very leery about trusting yourself trusting others. Im so glad he sounds much stronger in this video and finally is fighting back. I dont know if people will ever hear the truth, I hope they do...but knowing the way our fucked up media works, the corrections NEVER makes it to the front page. They have no problem SCREAMING the lie, everyone see's that....not many see the fine print correction on page 3 though, sadly.

comment:
This is speculation, but...  It sounds like someone who is incapable of seeing past her own misfortune to see the misfortune of others.  Almost like she can't in any way rank Johnny's misfortune as equal to or worse than her own.  Or to perceive any justification for what he did as being equal to or better than her own justification for what she did.  When she tries to think about it, her brain keeps pressing her on the importance of her misfortune and the righteousness of her behavior, regardless of counter-arguments, causing her to rationalize it and then actually believe it.  Those emotions limit her perception.

Most people probably do this to an extent.  It just seems like an especially bad case of it.

comment:
HEY INCREDIBLY AVERAGE DUDE WHO NEVER MENTIONS HIS NAME.....I feel for Johnny and I don't think he is the aggressor.  I think Amber at this point is in a whole lot of trouble and along with her story completely falling apart so is she.  She is no doubt an evil genius but she is at the end of her rope and has failed to cover all her bases.  I don't think it's far fetched to anticipate her to SNAP soon.  I think it is quite possible that she is capable of doing something really bat shit crazy like harm herself or someone else.  I bet all the money ever printed that TMZ will be reporting on a murder, or a suicide or a homicide or a drunk driving fatality etc. or something to this magnitude.  All anyone has to do is google Amber Heard and read the related stories.  Her life and career is falling apart in a big way.  Karma has finally come calling.  My guess is that she had a diabolical upbringing and was treated ever so harshly by her mother as for her to have been indoctrinated with a set of satanic like life skills into her psyche. She was only destined for evil when she were to enter into a relationship with none other than...Captain Jack Sparrow.  Now as for him, I think he's a glutton for punishment who has a big heart and foolish mind to think he could either save her from herself or just be enticed into having amazing angry sex from time to time with such a MEPHISTOPHELIAN siren leading our beloved captain oh so very dangerously close to the rocks.  Look up that word.... It seems extremely appropriate for it to be her middle name instead of just plain Loura.  Certainly makes more sense anyway.

     Incredibly average dude,  you have put in so much time and effort from the start to push out the facts of this case... you must be somewhat vested by such a crazy sad series of events it must be difficult not to become emotionally involved on some level.  My guess is that you are anticipating a tragic end to this crazy story just like I am.    BTW,  you have done an amazing job covering this Hollywood horror story and I for one commend you for a stellar job for doing so.  I bet Johnny will want to thank you personally after he gets his name cleared and his reputation and life back on track.  I bet you will find yourself sitting down at a restaurant toasting a glass of wine and he thanking you for all your support.  I think we all would like to know what are your thoughts to this final chapter.  How do you think it will end for our beloved Captain Jack and little miss Beelzebub??

author: Jewel Grace Judi

comment:
Another frightening telephone-revelation where the brat in the couple has the same behaviour as in the other video. She is out of control, unpredictable, and dangerous while he is constantly civil and thoughtful. Through the video, you can tell that she was conspiring to exploit and mistreat him. And all the while she talks, she thinks only about herself, never asks about his feelings and his pains. With her, it's always "Me-me-me-me". And I have seen plenty of people like that in my life to know that they are irrecuperable. That they are just thinking of their navel. And here it is the opportunities she gets by being around Johnny Depp. 

And the minute she accuses him of spreading to the press insults and names everyone always had for her since the beginning because they knew how vile she is, well it was the last straw for him. The way he raises his voice, you can sense in it the realisation that this woman never liked him. Was just a gold-digging brat who loved his money, and that the romantic image he had of this woman never existed and was just a fantasy. In the end, I feel bad for Johnny. And I feel bad for his kids who had to deal with her BS. Right at the end, she realizes that she lost him. And the way she mocks and whines about his pain and the way that if he goes to court and accuses her, no one will believe her because she is a poor woman and he is a strong man is just sickening. Again another veil she puts in front of her face regarding her sick violence that she releases through every word she speaks. Words that, no surprise, certain people in Hollywood have exploited as well. All of them with a point in common. Holding the same desperation for stardom and spitefulness for their colleagues' success. In the end, people that make me realize how rotten Hollywood is and how so many of them are ready to backstab and sell their common sense to the devil for cash. 

And as for those who have embarked now into the "If she was abusive, then he must have been" game, and there is a couple of Harry Potter fandom people who have embarked into these attacks like they did for years, well I do not want to hear anything from these opportunists. To me, these fandom people have no sympathy from me as they not only insulted Johnny, but also insulted and attacked J K Rowling, the same woman whom they love to bash when it is trendy, all the while exploiting her series for their conventions/fan sites. 

Thank you again for this great share, Brian. Always a joy seeing your videos. And if Johnny Depp sees this video, I want him to know that I always stood by his side. Always knew he was innocent. Always. Because he has always had a history of kindness, integrity, and honesty around him. That was present for decades and never wavered. And I also want him to know that several people of many fandom are behind him (ex: Michael Jackson, Vic Mignogna, Woody Allen, etc.). We are with you, Johnny Depp. Always have, always will be.
author: Simon Barr√©-Brisebois

comment:
Wasnt Amber the one who kept selling info to the media every  time Johnny denied something during the divorce? lol Moreover,she says that she didnt file a police report because she didn't want to hurt him... But she goes to the media!  
Her story of the December 15th events is INSANE! (first time reading it) Ad we never saw a single bruise on her face. How interesting that we NEVER saw a single bruise on her face... I'm sure that an attack like that is not easy to cover.
And when she says no one will believe him? The way she starts playing victim card by saying "I'm a 115pound woman and you're much more stronger and big man" instead of simply denying that she physically abused him?! That's pure evil. The worst thing is that people believed her  for a long time! Thanks God Johnny recorded all this material because otherwise people would still support  her, THE ABUSER. 
Also, it broke my heart when he mentioned Jack while she only cared about her reputation/integrity.


And the end of this audio is "PERFECT" because it really shows who's the abuser: Amber screaming like crazy while blaming him for everything, Johnny decides to go to court after realizing that she's insane and out of nowhere Amber calms down, tries to deny what she just said and acts like a different person. "There's no need to be cruel on top of it". Really?! He wasn't even being cruel. After that, everything starts over again: she's blaming him, playing the victim, screaming... 
She definitely has a problem and, as I said before, I'm reallyglad that Johnny recorded all these phone calls. Now everyone can see the real Amber and who was the real victim. 




Sorry for the long comment but I wrote this while listening to the audio and it's funny that you finished the video by saying the same thing about her change when Johnny changes his attitude... We all noticed the same thing.

comment:
This brings back so many bad memories of dealing with my ex wife. Same exact mentality and tactics as amber.
I filed for divorce about 15 years ago, it was finalized a few months later, and I have had to continue dealing with it since, up until about 6 months ago.
Society created women like this...
Society needs to fix it... but it won't
My advice to John... Cease any and all further interactions.
If communication is necessary... only ever do so through email and/or text... never on the phone (even recorded) because recordings have to be transcribed and are not always accurate.
Even if you can listen like this... in a court, it has to be transcribed, and then context can change and there are too many inaccuracies.
This is my advice to anyone going through these sorts of situations.

comment:
There has to be some sort of punishment in place for people who lie as Amber Heard has here.  I've been saying this for years now.  Every time a case like this comes up, feminists say that punishing the false accuser in cases like this will make it harder for real victims to come forward.

My thing is that someone who's telling the truth has nothing to worry about.  

 Someone who actually has not been attacked in any way and whose intent is to defame the other person, have them falsely thrown in jail, or gain something from them financially, if they are proven to have lied then they should actually get jail time and have to pay restitution, something.  There should be something that at least deters these people from doing what they do.

Depp, and others like him,  have to carry around that stigma for the rest of their lives.  Even though we're learning the truth of the matter, damage has been done to his reputation.  He's lost at least one big acting role, people treat him differently now, etc.  That's a damn shame, and I hope this case FINALLY gets some type of reprimand for this bullshit put into the system.

comment:
Yet people are still making excuses for her. People are still saying Johnny Depp is the abuser. When will anyone face the reality that people lie & will also manipulated others so they will be believed.

Just because she is a woman doesnt mean she is telling the truth! Men get abused too!
Its disgusting that people are sticking by her even though there is evidence. These fans have not listened to any of the audio properly. 
This woman has more less destroyed his career. 

Many people who know Johnny personally have call said how laid back he is & that he is such a quiet person. 
The other audio she shouted & he stayed calm. She even told him to take drugs! She wouldnt let him finish talking, she wouldnt answer his questions & you can hear him say in some parts why isnt she answering his questions & she kicks off over it... THAT IS WHAT YOU CALL CONTROL.
